message.body: Hello!
hey! sorry i didn't respond quicker, i was at the hobbit. :) how are you?
Haha, it's cool, how was that? And I'm great, thanks for asking, I had a pretty good Christmas.
it was definitely a spectacle. so santa was good to you? did you get to see all your family?

Yeah, I didn't really get anything, but I didn't really want anything, all I asked my parents for was some help with buying textbooks for the spring. And yeah, lots of family time, especially with my sister and her kid
aw, yeah, i know you're fond of your little niece.
Yeah, she's da bomb. So what about you, good holiday?
oopsie, i guess i totally fell asleep. we really are on like opposite schedules.
Haha yeah, we definitely are, I've been up since yesterday myself, haha, I'm pretty beat.
why no sleep?
Lol I dunno, I just can't sleep sometimes. Thankfully I'm gonna pass the fuck out soon, so if I suddenly stop replying I apologize.
hey, it's not like i've never done it to you. :)
Haha, that's true, I guess I owe you one :p So what've you been up to, anything exciting happen since we last talked?
for some reason i read that as "since we were last naked"... but actually. and no, not really. i did nothing productive today except eat lunch with my family and walk into town for coffee.
Well, that's certainly not productive, but it sounds fun. And no, haha, in fact we've never been naked together, as far as I can remember. It's never too late to start, though.
i walked into that one. :P
You sure did, come on Lauren, you're making it too easy to hit on you. Jk it is easy because you're gorgeous.
you're too much, haha. asleep yet?
Haha, sorry, I very much did fall asleep and forgot to respond when I woke up.
no probsies. what time did you get up?
5am, I got up and went out on my porch and watched the rain for a few minutes.
those moments are really special.
Yeah, definitely, good times, I love the rain.
i tried to send you a picture of me and katie but it won't send.
Aww, bummer, I certainly wouldn't mind seeing you two lovely ladies.
we're not looking particularly great, just pretty gone, haha.
Haha, well that's definitely fun too.
Wish I was there!
me too!
yessss!
Maybe next time.
Awesome, just lemme know :) I would offer to come chill now but I figure it's late and all.
What's up, Lauren?
not a great moment for me, not super happy at the moment. how are you?
Aww, what's wrong? And I'm fine, btw.
zach, as usual. we haven't talked for a few days and of course when we do i end up making him angry at me. it sucks that i let him control my emotions like this.
Wait, who's Zach?
that guy i dated at the beginning of the semester. we're friends now or whatever.
Oooooh, I see, that sucks :( Well is he worth all the trouble? Just on an objective, greater-or-less-than sort of sense?

no, he's not. he's a shitty friend, plus we don't really have much in common or enough history to go on to make it work otherwise. and i never know where i stand with him. but i don't really see a way out and i do still care about him (not like romantically, but you know how it is).

Meh, I mean, I guess the heart wants what it wants or whatever, but I say fuck 'em, if a person's not worth the trouble they cause I don't give them the time of day. I'd hate to see you put so much effort into some ass.
i just can't imagine myself doing that to someone.

I mean, sometimes it happens. I wrote off a close friend of mine because she was really shitty person, a few years later she had changed a lot and now we're fine. But if she was still shitty I'd say "Hey, not worth it".
i really admire that. i do.
Haha and here I thought you were gonna say I was too harsh.
no, i think it's awesome, haha.
Well them follow my example! Trust me, you're good enough to attract decent guys.
i just can't. hoping to work on the "finding better friends" thing this semester, though, for sure.
Definitely, get on that, shitty people aren't worth it! Just try to be a little meaner, you're nice enough that you can afford it.
hahaha, i just can't find the balance. i was such a bitch in high school, and i try so hard to suppress that now.
Aw, I don't remember you being bitchy in high school
then you lucked out. ask anyone.
Meh, either way, high school was stupid, the things that happened then barely even count.
preach.
GET I GET AN AMEN! Haha, but seriously, you should declare right now that you're gonna write off Zach since you know he no good for you
Lol that was supposed to be can I get an amen, whoops. Sorry, lil high.
it's cool. i just can't do it. i know i can't trust him with anything, but he did apologize for what he said tonight.
Aww, well I think you oughta hold out for a guy who doesn't have to apologize, but whatever, it's your life and all, I trust your judgement. I hope whatever you do makes you happy!
i mean, it's not like i have a set number of spots in my life for people, and i have to drop one friend to pick up another... but thanks. i'm going to bed.
Alright, well, goodnight then Lauren! Hope I get to see your pretty face before you go off to school!
